sentences.sContent: The military intends to hand over power to a caretaker government and hold elections within six months.
sentences.sCn: 军方打算将权力移交给临时政府，并在6个月内进行选举。

remMethod.val: 来自词组take care (of) (照料， 处理)

trans.tranOther: A caretaker government or leader is in charge temporarily until a new government or leader is appointed
someone whose job is to look after a building, especially a school
